General.Name: Lake Resources NL
General.Description: Lake Resources NL explores for and develops lithium brine projects in Argentina. Its flagship project is its 100% owned the Kachi lithium brine project that consists of 39 mining leases covering an area of approximately 74,000 hectares located in Catamarca province, Argentina. Lake Resources NL was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

4.Name: Mr. Scott  Munro
4.Title: Sr. VP of Technology, Strategy & Risk
